description: This file defines a health check API endpoint using Flask, with a class-based view called HealthCheck that returns a simple 'Healthy' message. It is part of a Flask application using flask_smorest for API view management.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class that handles GET requests to return a health status message.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to return the health status message.
